results.title: Metformin inhibits EV-A71 and CVA16 infections by regulating TRIB3-SCARB2 axis and activating AMPK.
results.text_hl: These findings suggest that @GENE_TRIB3 @GENE_57761 @@@TRIB3@@@ does have potential as a target for antiviral drugs, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may be a potential agent or supplement against @<m>DISEASE_Enterovirus_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004769 @@@enterovirus infection@@@.
